verses.verse: And when any <S%H5315><s%> will offer <S%H7126><s%> a food <S%H4503><s%> offering <S%H7133><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, his offering <S%H7133><s%> shall be of fine flour <S%H5560><s%>; and he shall pour <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> upon it <S%H5414><s%>, and put frankincense on it <S%H3828><s%>

And he shall bring <S%H935><s%> it to Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%>: and he shall take <S%H7061><s%> out <S%H8033><s%> his handful <S%H7062><s%> of the flour <S%H5560><s%> there <S%H8081><s%>, and of the oil there <S%H3828><s%>, with all the frankincense there and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> the memorial <S%H234><s%> of it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, to be an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>:

And the remnant <S%H3498><s%> of the food offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s and his sons <S%H1121><s%>': it is a thing most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> of the offerings <S%H801><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>.

And if you bring <S%H7126><s%> an oblation <S%H7133><s%> of a food offering <S%H4503><s%> baked <S%H3989><s%> in the oven <S%H8574><s%>, it shall be unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H2471><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, or unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafers <S%H7550><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>.

And if your oblation <S%H7133><s%> be a food offering <S%H4503><s%> baked in a pan <S%H4227><s%>, it shall be of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%>, mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>.
You shall part <S%H6626><s%> it in pieces <S%H6595><s%>, and pour <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> on it it is a food offering <S%H4503><s%>.
And if your oblation <S%H7133><s%> be a food offering <S%H4503><s%> baked in the fryingpan <S%H4802><s%>, it shall be made <S%H6213><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>.

And you shall bring <S%H935><s%> the food offering <S%H4503><s%> that is made <S%H6213><s%> of these things unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: and when it is presented <S%H7126><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%>, he shall bring <S%H5066><s%> it unto the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H7311><s%> from the food offering <S%H4503><s%> a memorial <S%H234><s%> there <S%H6999><s%>, and shall burn it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>: it is an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And that which is left <S%H3498><s%> of the food offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s and his sons <S%H1121><s%>': it is a thing most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> of the offerings <S%H801><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>.

No food offering <S%H4503><s%>, which you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, shall be made <S%H6213><s%> with yeast <S%H2557><s%>: for you shall burn <S%H6999><s%> no yeast <S%H7603><s%>, nor any honey <S%H1706><s%>, in any offering <S%H801><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>.

As for the oblation <S%H7133><s%> of the firstfruits <S%H7225><s%>, you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> them unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: but they shall not be burnt <S%H5927><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%>.

And every oblation <S%H7133><s%> of your food offering <S%H4503><s%> shall you season <S%H4414><s%> with salt <S%H4417><s%>; neither shall you allow the salt <S%H4417><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of your God <S%H430><s%> to be lacking <S%H7673><s%> from your food offering <S%H4503><s%>: with all your offerings <S%H7133><s%> you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> salt <S%H4417><s%>.

And if you offer <S%H7126><s%> a food offering <S%H4503><s%> of your firstfruits <S%H1061><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> for the food offering <S%H4503><s%> of your firstfruits <S%H1061><s%> green ears <S%H24><s%> of corn dried <S%H7033><s%> by the fire <S%H784><s%>, even corn beaten <S%H1643><s%> out of full ears <S%H3759><s%>.
And you shall put <S%H5414><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> upon it <S%H7760><s%>, and lay frankincense <S%H3828><s%> on it it is a food offering <S%H4503><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> the memorial <S%H234><s%> of it <S%H1643><s%>, part of the beaten corn there <S%H8081><s%>, and part of the oil there <S%H3828><s%>, with all the frankincense there it is an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
